This technique is a variation of the Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm where either two [[Gentle Fist]] users,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 521, page 10</ref> or a single person using both hands,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 614, page 10</ref> sends a powerful wave of compressed [[chakra]] from either palm simultaneously and with great force towards an opponent. The chakra released from the user's palms targets their opponent's vitals while also knocking them off their feet with concussive force.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]'', Hamura Ōtsutsuki uses this as part of his Ninjutsu: 8 Trigrams Palm Void technique.
